title: AI Practical Competencies Strengthening: Secondary Educator English Writing via Digital Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners must achieve a 90%+ completion rate of competition-based writing tasks provided by the digital gamification platform within six months to increase writing frequency
Learners must improve their ability to write English business reports at least twice monthly using gamification elements (badges, levels, leaderboards)
Learners must achieve a 30% reduction in grammatical errors across five consecutive writing assignments through the gamification feedback system
Learners must complete at least 10 personalized writing assignments using the difficulty-adjustment feature set in the gamification environment
Learners must improve the speed of writing work-related English emails by 20% through time-limited gamification-based tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
